title: Black Screen into Champ Select
body: I started up a ranked game and after accepting i was greeted by a black screen on my client. I was first pick and i could here it ticking down but I tried hitting every imaginable set of keys to see something and clicking where i thought the ban buttons would be but nothing worked. Needless to say i was kicked for queue dodging and lost 3 LP and got a 5 minute timer. Is this being looked at being fixed? Does riot know about this? If it continues will lost LP be awarded back? Edit: It happened again right after I joined another game. Read a little and it seems collapsing the friends list works to stop it. Lost another 10 LP and a 30:00 min timer. Awesome.

replies.body:
Seconded, although I simply get kicked out of queue over and over; whatever they were trying
to accomplish by making a new client when this is what we get is beyond me. 
Yes, I read all the flowery blubbergush, but fact is the
game hates the new client and the smallest tweak seems to have the potential to make it all unplayable!
From day one, it's been inferior in any and all ways from what we had before.

Hate to rant but this really just came to a head for me.
Happened to me too 2 times in a row, now i'm on timer too
I had an exactly same issue today. I couldn't select champion due to the black screen, and got 5 min wait then 30mins wait. Plus 13 points lose. It drive me crazy. Do something pls.
